image.alt: Westrock Orthodontics team smiling in clinic

paragraphs.text: At Westrock Orthodontics, we know that a straighter smile can improve overall health and build confidence. Our team of orthodontic specialists is passionate about delivering results that boost self‑confidence and quality of life. With trusted experts and flexible payment options, we make orthodontics accessible for children, teens, and adults and focus on the patient experience from the first call to the final smile.

items.title: Smile Changes Lives
items.text: We focus on life‑changing outcomes: straighter teeth that improve confidence and daily quality of life.

items.title: Ortho for All Ages
items.text: Comprehensive care for children, teens, and adults with treatment plans tailored to each life stage.

items.title: Insurance & Payments
items.text: We accept most major insurance plans and offer flexible payment options to fit your budget.

items.title: Fast Start & Tech
items.text: Same‑day starts when available and modern digital orthodontics to speed treatment and improve comfort.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Kyle S. Wendfeldt is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Arkansas. Dr. Wendfeldt treats children, teens, and adults, providing custom treatment plans for every patient. From invisible aligners, clear braces, and traditional braces to retainers, Westrock Orthodontics has you covered.

button.label: Meet Dr. Wendfeldt
button.aria_label: Learn about Dr. Kyle S. Wendfeldt

paragraphs.text: Dr. Aisha Henry is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> treatment. She treats children, teens, and adults, creating custom treatment plans that may include invisible aligners, clear braces, traditional braces, retainers, and whitening.

Dr. Darren Hallums is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup>. He attended Saint Louis University’s Center for Advanced Dental Education and was awarded a Masters of Science in Dentistry and Orthodontics and his Certificate to Practice Orthodontics. He passed the ABO exam in February of 2020 and is a Board Certified Orthodontist.

Dr. Katie Guelos Gibson is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup>. She treats both children and adults and creates custom treatment plans that may include invisible aligners, clear braces, traditional braces, and retainers.

She treats children, teens, and adults, planning treatments that consider facial esthetics for straight, balanced results.

Dr. Amy J. Schulte is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup>. She treats children, teens, and adults and develops individualized plans using clear aligners, clear braces, traditional braces, and retainers.

image.alt: Patient at Westrock showing a smile, representing Invisalign treatment

testimonials.author: Jennifer J.
testimonials.testimonial: “I compared plans between a couple of orthos before choosing Westrock. I liked what they proposed to do better and they have more than one location so if I couldn't make an appointment for a day they were in my town, I could go to the neighboring town! There were more hours of availability between the two locations.”

testimonials.author: Mandy B.
testimonials.testimonial: “The doctors and staff at Westrock are so caring and friendly! Our family has, and will continue to, recommend Westrock Orthodontics to our friends and family!”

testimonials.author: Nathan P.
testimonials.testimonial: “The front desk lady was really kind and friendly. Made the whole experience super welcoming. I can’t wait to go back for my next appointment!”

testimonials.author: Diana M.
testimonials.testimonial: “My son’s experience at Westrock was amazing. He was so nervous in getting his braces. The staff and Dr. made him feel less nervous and discussed every step of the process. We are so happy to have chosen Westrock for his orthodontic care.”

image.alt: Parents with kids relaxing in front of home

og_meta.title: Home - Westrock Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Westrock Orthodontics provides compassionate care across Arkansas and Missouri with Invisalign®, metal and clear braces, same‑day starts, and flexible payment.

image.alt: Patient showing a confident smile at Westrock Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We understand that everyone is different; that’s why we believe that every patient should have a unique treatment plan that works perfectly for them and their lifestyle.
We believe in using the latest technology and treatment methods to provide amazing outcomes for our patients.

Our team provides care that is accessible, comfortable, and tailored to each individual's needs. We offer braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> to help patients of all ages achieve healthy, confident smiles.
Through modern imaging, gentle techniques, and flexible scheduling, we focus on lasting relationships and results that fit each patient’s life.

Dr. AnnaKate Tatum is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Arkansas. She is an Invisalign<sup>®</sup> Diamond Provider and creates custom treatment plans for children, teens, and adults to deliver strong functional results and confident smiles.

Dr. Darren Hallums is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Arkansas. He treats children, teens, and adults, creating custom treatment plans for each patient.

Dr. Hallums attended Saint Louis University’s Center for Advanced Dental Education where he earned a Master of Science in Dentistry and a Certificate in Orthodontics. He passed the ABO exam in February 2020 and is Board Certified.

Dr. Rodney Lewis is an orthodontist in Fayetteville, certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Arkansas. He treats children, teens, and adults with individualized care and custom treatment plans.

Dr. Henry Hoffman is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup>. He serves patients in Camdenton, MO and focuses on personalized treatment plans for children, teens, and adults.

Dr. Kurt Hoffman is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Missouri. He provides individualized care and comprehensive treatment planning for patients of all ages.

Dr. Kyle S. Wendfeldt is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Arkansas. He treats children, teens, and adults and builds personalized treatment plans focused on facial esthetics and long-term function.

Dr. Mark L. Dake is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Arkansas. He serves multiple Westrock locations and focuses on delivering tailored care for patients across ages.

Dr. Kenneth Edwards is an orthodontic specialist certified to provide braces and Invisalign<sup>®</sup> in Raymore. He treats children, teens, and adults and focuses on personalized, effective care.

seo.page_keywords: Westrock Orthodontics, orthodontist, braces, Invisalign, team, office tour

og_meta.title: About Us | Westrock Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Westrock Orthodontics' team, mission, and commitment to personalized orthodontic care across our regional offices.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Your first visit begins with a free, no‑obligation consultation. You’ll meet our team, receive a complete oral exam and X‑rays when needed, and we’ll explain which treatment options best match your goals, including Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, clear braces, metal braces, or a same‑day start.

We know your time is valuable. Call us for a free consult or book your first visit online. If you choose to begin treatment that day, same‑day braces are available so you can get started without delay.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We’ve Got You. We accept most major insurance plans, including Delta Dental, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Medicaid, UnitedHealthcare, and more. We also accept CareCredit to help make treatment affordable.
Our treatment coordinator will review your benefits, file claims electronically when possible, and help you choose a payment plan that fits your budget.
To save time at your appointment, please complete our new patient forms before you arrive. If you prefer, bring printed copies with you and we’ll collect them when you check in.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online

seo.page_description: Book your free consultation at Westrock Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit, find new patient forms, and explore financing options.
seo.page_keywords: orthodontics, first visit, free consultation, Westrock Orthodontics, Invisalign

og_meta.title: Get Started | Westrock Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Book your free consultation at Westrock Orthodontics. Learn what to expect at your first visit, find new patient forms, and explore financing options.

paragraphs.text: We understand everyone is different. Our team builds a personalized plan that fits your goals and lifestyle, whether you need early care for a child or discreet options for an adult.
Using a clear, customized series of aligners, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> gradually moves teeth into the position you desire with predictable, removable treatment.
Aligners make brushing, flossing, and eating easier than bracketed options while still delivering precise tooth movement.

image.alt: Invisalign treatment mockup on phone screen

paragraphs.text: Clear ceramic braces blend with your tooth color for a less noticeable option without sacrificing effectiveness.
They provide reliable tooth movement for teens and adults who want an aesthetic alternative to metal.
Traditional metal braces remain a durable, cost-effective choice for patients of all ages, offering precise control of tooth movement.
Our team customizes treatment to balance efficiency, comfort, and the results you expect.
We know your time is valuable. With same day braces you can begin treatment at your consultation and start progressing toward your new smile immediately.

image.alt: Patient showing new smile after braces

paragraphs.text: Goodbye to messy impressions. Our iTero Element scanner captures a fast, radiation-free 3D image to improve comfort and treatment accuracy.
Scans take about a minute and feed into digital treatment planning for more predictable results.

image.alt: iTero digital scanner in treatment room

paragraphs.text: We offer a full range of orthodontic care for children, teens, and adults so everyone can get the smile they deserve.

image.alt: Family smiling together after orthodontic care

paragraphs.text: We know paying for treatment can feel overwhelming. We accept many insurances and offer in-house financing plus CareCredit to help make treatment affordable.

image.alt: Patient showing smile and discussing payment options
